thread.title: Vancouver Limo Company Offers New Corporate Service
thread.title_full: Vancouver Limo Company Offers New Corporate Service

title: Vancouver Limo Company Offers New Corporate Service
text:
October 19, 2015 10:30 ET Vancouver Limo Company Offers New Corporate Service 
Vancouver Limo Company Provides Pick Up and Drop Off for Clients and Investors During Business Meetings 
VANCOUVER, BC --(Marketwired - October 19, 2015) - Royal Limo, a limousine service based in Vancouver , has created a new service that exclusively caters to businesses and other organizations. With their new corporate limo service, companies can have clients, investors, and other VIPs chauffeured directly to and from meetings or other important events. Read more at http://www.royallimo.ca/limo-vancouver-corporate-service 
"This is executive business class treatment in a car," says company owner Mike Dorin. "We created this service to help businesses facilitate smoother meetings with their investors, clients and other key stakeholders." 
Drivers from Royal Limo arrive in pristine uniforms. All cars feature luxurious leather seats, tinted windows, fully integrated sound systems, and privacy screens. A network of knowledgeable operators are available to assist drivers who may be facing congestion, roadwork, or other delays, so whether the destination is a hotel, conference or restaurant, Royal Limo will ensure guests arrive on time. 
For the corporate limousine service , Royal Limo offers many luxurious models, including the stretch SUV limo, sedan, and the Cadillac Escalade. 
"Royal Limo offers competitive rates and price matching," says Dorin. "A variety of package deals based on the distance and number of passengers are available, as well as an hourly rate and daily discount rentals." 
About the Company 
With a full fleet of luxurious vehicles for customers to choose from, Royal Limo is Vancouver's best choice for limousine and luxury vehicle rental. Royal Limo Vancouver services all the major cities of the Lower Mainland, and each vehicle features an array of luxury amenities for clients to enjoy. Rates are competitive and the service is excellent. More information is available at 604-727-0950 or online at http://www.royallimo.ca/ . 
For more information, visit http://www.royallimo.ca or call 604-727-0950. Contact Information
